text: Moti Lal Dhar ( 22 October 1914 - 20 January 2002) was an eminent drug chemist, and science administrator in India. He remained Director Central Drug Research Institute, Lucknow from 1960 until his retirement in 1972 and he has been the only Kashmiri Pandit to serve as Vice- Chancellor, of Banaras Hindu University, B.H.U.Moti Lal Dhar == References == Category:1914 births Category:2002 deaths Category:20th-century Indian chemists Category:Vice Chancellors of Banaras Hindu University Category:Kashmiri people Category:People from Srinagar district Category:Recipients of the Padma Shri in science & engineering
title: Moti Lal Dhar
